p.span: To provide accurate, current, and helpful information, The Hadley-Luzerne School District has created this page as a centralized resource for our community in response to COVID-19. As we begin to navigate through the unprecedented school closure that our community is enduring, we would like to first and foremost thank each and every one of you in the Hadley-Luzerne School District for your patience and understanding during this time. Please use the information on this page as your source for reliable and accurate information. As always, if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact the school.
